title: Chocolate Cream Cheese Muffins
ingredients: ['225g cream cheese', '1 egg', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '170g plain chocolate chips', '200g plain flour', '200g caster sugar', '4 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '250ml water', '75ml vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon distilled malt vinegar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
